misc: Waters the course more than the course sprinklers.
biography: Pekka, a formidable presence from Espoo Ringside Golf, is known for his meticulous approach to the game and his uncanny ability to read the greens. Off the course, rumour has it that he spends more time watering the course than the course sprinklers.

With six past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Pekka's experience is undeniable. He has secured one coveted Hector Trophée victory, demonstrating his capabilities in pair play. Although the Victor Trophy has eluded him so far, his determination remains unwavering.
As he prepares for his seventh appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, Pekka is undoubtedly one to watch. His strategic mind and calm demeanor make him a formidable opponent.
